name: Bird is the Word (churches)
description:
Bird is the Word

Type as fast as you can to help speed up the cockatiel through the sky. Your speed increases based on your accuracy and words per minute, see how far you can travel in 30 seconds.

Created for Mini Jam 99 by Eric and Lucy Rollins

Jam theme: Birds
Jam Limitation: Can't stop moving.

Music authored by peastman: https://opengameart.org/content/peaceful-scene
